Warehouse name.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'System name' instead. Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchlinng/PostgreSQL compatible name.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Description.description: Documentation for the entity. This is not saved to Benchling.

Diagram.description: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Description.description: Documentation for the field. This is not saved to Benchling.

Tool tip.description: Field tool tip appears on hover on column headings.

Warehouse name.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'System name' instead. Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchlinng/PostgreSQL compatible name.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Multi-select.description: Field is a multi-select field when true.

Definition.description: Name of target object if Type is a one of the link types. May optionally point to a dropdown if type is Integer or Decimal.

Snapshot.description: Describes the snapshot computation if this is a snapshot computed field.

Formula.description: Name of formula using native Benchling tokens for now. TODO-For now, leave the items for arguments unspecified until this matures more. Add filters and other features.

Arguments.description: Formula arguments. These are dependent on the particular formula.

Steps.description: Lookup steps. Currently supports a list of 2 field values. First must be an entity field in the current schema. Second must be a field on the schema pointed to by step 1.

API ID.description: API ID for the entity created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.
